amendment.description: To provide a substitute for the preamble.

vote.text: Amendment SA 534 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 534 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Lugar. (consideration: CR S5690; text: CR S5690) To provide a substitute for the preamble.
